hanzi-su-wiki:
逃

Значения

Бежать, уклоняться, избегать; выпускать, упускать; избегать, избавляться; упускать

Мнемоника

Признак 兆 движения 辶 есть бег.

Варианты

迯

to escape; to run away; to flee
Сбежать; убежать; бежать

purpleculture_examples:
逃避 [ táo bì ]: to escape; to evade; to avoid; to shirk
逃走 [ táo zǒu ]: to escape; to flee; to run away
逃跑 [ táo pǎo ]: to flee from sth; to run away; to escape
逃脱 [ táo tuō ]: to run away; to escape
逃离 [ táo lí ]: to run out; to escape

heisig_chinese_memo: I used my pants to make a rope, which I then used to escape from prison; hence the naked, hairy human legs running along the road!
heisig_story: When escaping from something or someone, one always feels as if one is not going fast enough, like a turtle on an expressway. (Since the turtle is on the road and not on the left, it can keep its full kanji shape as given in frame 250.)
Keyword_KANJIDIC: escape, flee, shirk, evade, set free
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: бежать, бежать, ширк, уклонение, установить бесплатно
koohiiStory1: I used my pants to make a rope, which I then used to escape from prison; hence the naked, hairy legs running along the road!
koohiiStory2: A turtle version of frogger dodging cars to escape to the other side of the road...　　　RTK2:　トウ　逃走　とうそう(escape)...　　　　　　　MIXED GROUP:　桃236　(ﾁｮｳ): 兆235　眺237　挑658　跳1284.
kunYomi: に.げる、に.がす、のが.す、のが.れる
jp_example_words:
逃走(とうそう): flight, desertion, escape
逃亡(とうぼう): escape
逃げ出す(にげだす): to run away, to escape from
逃す(のがす): to let loose, to set free, to let escape
逃れる(のがれる): to escape
見逃す(みのがす): to miss, to overlook, to leave at large
逃がす(にがす): let loose, set free, let escape
逃げる(にげる): run away
jp_readingExamples: 逃がす (に.がす), 逃げる (に.げる), 逃す (のが.す), 逃れる (のが.れる)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You use your scooter when the omen comes so that you can escape.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Unfortunately, the omen is riding a scooter too, so you're going to have to be crafty to escape this omen properly.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You decide to escape this omen by weaving in and out of the busy streets of とうきょう. By now, you know とうきょう like the back of your hand, so you're sure you can escape this way.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine scooting in and out of とうきょう traffic, the omen looming ever further back behind you. You're doing it! You're escaping!
Ru_Meaning: escape, flee, shirk, evade, set free
Ru_trainchinese: táo: (глаг) бежать, скрываться; уклоняться, избегать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you're showing signs (兆) of moving (⻌) to escape
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: I used my pants to make a rope, which I then used to escape from prison; hence the naked, hairy human legs running along the road!
humanum_full_description_en:
From "辵", " Zhao " sound. " Zhao " is the first article of " fleeing ", and the radical "辵" was added later. The original meaning of " escape " is to flee, to escape. "Said Wen": "Flee, die. Congruo, Zhaosheng." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. Xuangong Sixteen Years": "So the thieves of the Jin Kingdom fled to Qin." "Tsinghua II. "Relationship Year" Jane 81: "Qi (Qi) the five (Wu) members and the five (Wu) chickens escape [𠂤 broom] (return to) Wu."

" Escape " means avoiding, avoiding. "Guang Ya. Interpretation III: "Escape, avoid." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. The Three Years of Xianggong": "(Wei) has no ambitions, the ruler does not solve problems, and he does not escape punishment if he is guilty." "Han Feizi. "Unspeakable": "However, although a sage cannot escape death, what about those who avoid killing and insult?"

" Fleeing " also means leaving and leaving. Such as "Mencius. "Fleeing from the ink": "Fleeing ink must return to Yang, escaping Yang must return to Confucianism." Zhao Qi's note: "The escapee, go also." "Book of Rites. "Qu Lixia": "The rites of being a man and a minister: do not show admonitions. If you do not listen to three admonitions, you will escape." Zheng Xuan's note: "Escape, go. If you are righteous, you will get together, and you will leave if you are not righteous.
humanum_short_description_en: From "辵", " Zhao " sound. The original meaning is to escape, but also means to avoid and leave.
humanum_full_description:
從「辵」，「兆」聲。「兆」是「逃」的初文，後來增加表意偏旁「辵」。「逃」的本義是逃亡、逃走。《說文》：「逃，亡也。从辵，兆聲。」如《左傳．宣公十六年》：「於是晉國之盜逃奔于秦。」《清華二．繫年》簡81：「亓（其）子五（伍）員與五（伍）之雞逃[𠂤帚]（歸）吳。」

　　「逃」表示躲避、逃避。《廣雅．釋詁三》：「逃，避也。」如《左傳．襄公三年》：「（魏）絳無貳志，事君不辟難，有罪不逃刑。」《韓非子．難言》：「然則雖賢聖不能逃死亡，避戮辱者何也？」

　　「逃」還表示離去、離開。如《孟子．盡心下》：「逃墨必歸於楊，逃楊必歸於儒。」趙岐注：「逃者，去也。」《禮記．曲禮下》：「為人臣之禮：不顯諫。三諫而不聽，則逃之。」鄭玄注：「逃，去也。君臣有義則合，無義則離。」
humanum_short_description: 從「辵」，「兆」聲。本義是逃亡，又表示躲避、離開。

從「 辵 」，「 兆 」聲。「 兆 」是「 逃 」的初文，後來增加表意偏旁「 辵 」。「 逃 」的本義是逃亡、逃走。《說文》：「逃，亡也。从辵，兆聲。」如《左傳．宣公十六年》：「於是晉國之盜逃奔于秦。」《清華二．繫年》簡81：「亓（其）子五（伍）員與五（伍）之雞逃[𠂤帚]（歸）吳。」 「 逃 」表示躲避、逃避。《廣雅．釋詁三》：「逃，避也。」如《左傳．襄公三年》：「（魏）絳無貳志，事君不辟難，有罪不逃刑。」《韓非子．難言》：「然則雖賢聖不能逃死亡，避戮辱者何也？」 「 逃 」還表示離去、離開。如《孟子．盡心下》：「逃墨必歸於楊，逃楊必歸於儒。」趙岐注：「逃者，去也。」《禮記．曲禮下》：「為人臣之禮：不顯諫。三諫而不聽，則逃之。」鄭玄注：「逃，去也。君臣有義則合，無義則離。」
From " 辵", " Zhao" sound. " Zhao" is the first article of " fleeing", and the radical " 辵" was added later. The original meaning of " escape" is to flee, to escape. "Said Wen": "Flee, die. Congruo, Zhaosheng." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. Xuangong Sixteen Years": "So the thieves of the Jin Kingdom fled to Qin." "Tsinghua II. "Relationship Year" Jane 81: "Qi (Qi) the five (Wu) members and the five (Wu) chickens escape [𠂤 broom] (return to) Wu." " Escape" means avoiding, avoiding. "Guang Ya. Interpretation III: "Escape, avoid." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. The Three Years of Xianggong": "(Wei) has no ambitions, the ruler does not solve problems, and he does not escape punishment if he is guilty." "Han Feizi. "Unspeakable": "However, although a sage cannot escape death, what about those who avoid killing and insult?" " Fleeing" also means leaving and leaving. Such as "Mencius. "Fleeing from the ink": "Fleeing ink must return to Yang, escaping Yang must return to Confucianism." Zhao Qi's note: "The escapee, go also." "Book of Rites. "Qu Lixia": "The rites of being a man and a minister: do not show admonitions. If you do not listen to three admonitions, you will escape." Zheng Xuan's note: "Escape, go. If you are righteous, you will get together, and you will leave if you are not righteous.

逃字的基本解释

逃
táo
为躲避不利于自己的环境或事物而离开：逃跑。逃敌。逃匿。逃遁。逃逸。
躲开不愿意或不敢接触的事物：逃避。逃难（n刵 ）。逃汇。逃税。逃世（避世）。
遁追

逃字的汉语字典释义
逃字的康熙字典解释
逃字的源字形
逃字的起名意思

逃走，逃跑。避开，躲避。

escape
Basic explanation of words
escape
táo
Leaving in order to avoid the environment or things that are not conducive to oneself: escape. Flee the enemy. escape and hide. escape. escape.
Avoid things you don't want or dare not touch: escape. Escape (n 刵). Escaping foreign exchange. tax evasion. Escape (avoid the world).
Escape
escape
Chinese dictionary definition of words
escape
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
escape
Source glyph
escape
Name meaning
Run away, run away. Avoid, avoid.
táo
гл.
1) бежать, скрыться, сбежать; обратиться в бегство
潜逃 тайком бежать
项羽围成皐, 汉王逃 Сян Юй обложил г. Чэнгао, и ханьский ван (будущий Гао-цзу) бежал (скрылся)
2) уклоняться (отходить) от, избегать (чего-л.); удаляться от; покидать, бросать (кого-л.)
逃服兵之义务 уклоняться от воинской повинности
目逃 избегать взглядом
逃墨必归于杨 отходя от школы МоДи, непременно обратишься к школе Ян Чжу
Radicals: 兆  (omen, scooter)
Meaning Mnemonic
You use your scooter when the omen comes so that you can escape.
Unfortunately, the omen is riding a scooter too, so you're going to have to be crafty to escape this omen properly.
Reading Mnemonic
You decide to escape this omen by weaving in and out of the busy streets of とうきょう. By now, you know とうきょう like the back of your hand, so you're sure you can escape this way.
Imagine scooting in and out of とうきょう traffic, the omen looming ever further back behind you. You're doing it! You're escaping!
